integrations.oauth2MicrosoftInfo: You'll be redirected to Microsoft to authorize access. This method works with Microsoft 365 security defaults and is more secure than password authentication.
integrations.googleOAuthCredentialsInfo: Enter your Google Cloud OAuth 2.0 credentials. Create these in the Google Cloud Console under APIs & Services > Credentials > Create OAuth client ID.
integrations.microsoftTenantIdDescription: Required only for single-tenant apps. Leave empty for multi-tenant apps.
integrations.microsoftOAuthCredentialsInfo: Create an app registration in Azure Portal (Microsoft Entra ID > App registrations).
integrations.microsoftRedirectUriInfo: Add the following redirect URI to your app registration (Authentication > Add a platform > Web):
integrations.gmailAppPasswordInfo: Use Gmail App Passwords for quick setup. Requires 2FA enabled on your Google account.
integrations.outlookSecurityWarning: Microsoft 365 security defaults block password authentication. This may not work for your account.
integrations.useSsoCredentialsDescription: Pre-fill with your organization's SSO app registration credentials.

sso.name: Single Sign-On
sso.description: Auto-provision teams and roles via Microsoft Entra ID SSO.
sso.title: SSO configuration
sso.ssoConfigured: SSO provider has been configured successfully
sso.domainHelp: The email domain for SSO authentication (e.g., yourcompany.com)
sso.issuerHelp: The OIDC issuer URL for your Entra ID tenant
sso.clientIdHelp: The Application (client) ID from Azure App Registration
sso.clientSecretHelp: The client secret from Azure App Registration
sso.autoProvisionTeamHelp: Automatically sync team memberships from Entra ID groups
sso.excludeGroupsHelp: Comma-separated list of Entra groups to exclude from team sync
sso.syncModeHelp: When enabled, team memberships are fully synced - users will be removed from teams they no longer belong to in Entra
sso.additiveModeHelp: When disabled, teams are only added - users keep existing team memberships even if removed in Entra
sso.autoProvisionRoleHelp: Automatically assign roles based on job title or app roles from Entra ID
sso.roleMappingRulesHelp: Define rules to map job titles or app roles to platform roles. Use * as wildcard (e.g., *developer*).
sso.defaultRoleHelp: Role assigned when no mapping rules match
sso.defaultRoleHelpNoAutoProvision: Role assigned to all SSO users
sso.oneDriveAccessHelp: Allow users to access OneDrive and SharePoint files using their SSO credentials
sso.testSuccessfulDescription: SSO credentials have been validated successfully
sso.testError: An error occurred while testing the connection
